titles.title: Suicide Prevention Analytics Act of 2018

To authorize a pilot program under which the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, expands and intensifies surveillance of self-harm and suicidal ideation behavior in partnership with State and local public health departments, and for other purposes.
Suicide Prevention Analytics Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Suicide Prevention Analytics Act of 2018
This bill amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to establish a pilot program that expands surveillance of self-harm and suicidal thoughts and behavior. The pilot program must be implemented through state and local public health departments.
